oauth_urlencode

(PECL OAuth >=0.99.2)

oauth_urlencode — Encode a URI to RFC3686

Description

string oauth_urlencode ( string $uri )

Encodes a URI to » RFC3686.

Parameters

uri

URI to encode.

Return Values

Returns an » RFC3686 encoded string.
